alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 12:30AM EST until February 18 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Buffalo NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New York... Tonawanda Creek At Attica affecting Wyoming and Genesee Counties. For the Tonawanda Creek...including Attica...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tonawanda Creek At Attica. * WHEN...Through late this morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flood stage, flooding begins on Prospect Street north of the bridge which may impact a commercial plaza there. Flooding on the Attica rodeo grounds and youth athletic field on Exchange Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:01 AM EST Friday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.1 feet before daybreak. It will then fall below flood stage early this morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.1 feet on 04/08/2001. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 900 AM EST.
